Package com.corochat.app.server.data.daos

Interface MessageDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageDaoImpl
    public interface MessageDao

    The MessageDao object

    This interface define the methods to interact with the message table in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        java.util.ArrayList<Message> getAll()
        Retrieve all the messages in the message table.
        Returns:
        ArrayList - The list of the messages contained in the message table.

      • getAllLimited

        java.util.ArrayList<Message> getAllLimited​(int limit)
        Retrieve a limited amount of messages in the message table.
        Parameters:
        limit - The limit needs to be greater than 0. It limits to N lines the request response.
        Returns:
        ArrayList - The list of the messages contained in the message table limited to N lines.

      • getMessagesByPseudo

        java.util.ArrayList<Message> getMessagesByPseudo​(java.lang.String pseudo)
        Getter of the messages by pseudo
        Parameters:
        pseudo - The pseudo of the user
        Returns:
        ArrayList - The messages belonging to the pseudo

      • insert

        void insert​(Message message)
        Insert a message in the message table
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be inserted

      • delete

        void delete​(Message message)
        Delete a message in the message table
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be deleted
